package.description: This package contains the latest code from the Bayesian Filtering Library (BFL). This ROS package does not modify BFL in any way; it simply provides a convenient way to download and compile the library in a way that can be managed by the ROS dependency system. This ROS package compiles BFL with the Boost library for matrix operations and random number generation.
